introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: BlogPro ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website https://blogpro.tech and use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways:
dataCollection.personal: Personal Information: Name, email address, username, and other information you provide when creating an account or contacting us
dataCollection.usage: Usage Data: Information about how you use our website, including pages visited, time spent, and interactions
dataCollection.technical: Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device information, and operating system
dataCollection.cookies: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze website usage

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.service: To provide, operate, and maintain our services
dataUse.communication: To communicate with you, including responding to your comments and questions
dataUse.improvement: To improve, personalize, and expand our website and services
dataUse.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.legal: To comply with legal requirements or protect our rights
dataSharing.business: In connection with a business transfer or merger

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Access: You can request access to your personal information
rights.correct: Correction: You can request correction of inaccurate information
rights.delete: Deletion: You can request deletion of your personal information
rights.portability: Portability: You can request a copy of your data in a structured format
rights.object: Object: You can object to processing of your personal information

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. Disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
